name: Night on Misty Lake
description:
A horror spin-off game inspired by Lakeview Cabin.

You play as Sin(-Sack), a cast-out from Human Village in Gensokyo, a region of japan hidden from outside world where all the folklore monsters reside.

Now you have to take shelter in an abandoned settlement without the protection of superior beings.

Fend of the 'Youkai', survive the night, maybe you will find safe haven again, one day.

The game is a work in progress, but the current version is playable on its own as a "part 1". 

If you liked the game and want to see it grow to a full game, you can help by donating, it would help me a great deal in completing it.
